entry.def: Your mother is the woman who gave birth to you. You can also call someone your mother if she brings you up as if she was this woman.

example.ex: She sat on the edge of her mother's bed...
She's an English teacher and a mother of two children...
example.tran: 她是英语教师，还是两个孩子的母亲。

entry.def: If a woman mothers a child, she looks after it and brings it up, usually because she is its mother.

example.ex: Colleen had dreamed of mothering a large family.
example.tran: 科琳曾梦想抚养一群孩子。

entry.def: If you mother someone, you treat them with great care and affection, as if they were a small child.

example.ex: She felt a great need to mother him...
example.tran: 她迫切地感到要细心照料他。

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who has given birth to a child (also used as a term of address to your mother);
2. a stringy slimy substance consisting of yeast cells and bacteria; forms during fermentation and is added to cider or wine to produce vinegar
3. a term of address for an elderly woman
4. a condition that is the inspiration for an activity or situation;

sentences.sentence: "Men often father children but don't recognize them"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mōdor, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch moeder and German Mutter, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin mater and Greek mētēr

sentences.en: I got stuck in the mother of all traffic jams.

sentences.cn: 我不要你的照顾！
sentences.en: Stop mothering me!

sentences.cn: 她是英语教师，还是两个孩子的母亲。
sentences.en: She's an English teacher and a mother of two children...

sentences.en: Colleen had dreamed of mothering a large family.

sentences.cn: 她迫切地感到要细心照料他。
sentences.en: She felt a great need to mother him...

sentences.cn: 别再宠我了。
sentences.en: Stop mothering me.

sentences.cn: 那么这并不符合常规的营救程序,对吗?
sentences.en: So you wouldn't consider this to be a normal rescue procedure.

sentences.cn: 我每次回家,母亲总对我体贴备至.
sentences.en: My mother makes a fuss of me every time I come home.

sentences.cn: 我们发现这个儿子很像他母亲.
sentences.en: We find the mother featured in the son.

sentences.cn: 你为什么把所有难做的事都留给你母亲?
sentences.en: Why do you leave all the hard work up to your mother?

sentences.cn: 经验为智慧之母.
sentences.en: Experience is the mother of wisdom.

sentences.cn: 那位母亲因虐待孩子被送交法院.
sentences.en: The mother was taken to court for kicking the children around.

sentences.cn: 她坐在母亲床边。
sentences.en: She sat on the edge of her mother's bed...

sentences.cn: 她是英语教师，还是两个孩子的母亲。
sentences.en: She's an English teacher and a mother of two children...

sentences.cn: 但是，大部分祖先鉴定只考虑单一的谱系，或者鉴定同一父系男性遗传的Y染色体，或者鉴定线粒体DNA，而线粒体DNA只能通过母亲遗传。
sentences.en: Yet most ancestry testing only considers a single lineage, either the Y chromosome inherited through men in a father's line or mitochondrial DNA, which is passed down only from mothers.

sentences.cn: 当然，像《美国周刊》与《人物》这样的名人杂志呈现的父母形象非常不靠谱，特别是提到像布鲁克这样的单身母亲时更不靠谱。
sentences.en: Of course, the image of parenthood that celebrity magazines like Us Weekly and People present is hugely unrealistic, especially when the parents are single mothers like Bullock.

sentences.cn: 据说，狄更斯的母亲来自一个较为体面的家庭。
sentences.en: Dickens's mother supposedly came from a more respectable family.

sentences.cn: 千禧一代“记得他们的父母亲被解雇。
sentences.en: Millennials "remember their father and mother both were laid off.

sentences.cn: 他削减了药物开支，也不再帮忙赡养他身有残疾的母 亲。
sentences.en: He’s cut back on medications and he no longer helps support his disabled mother.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 没人必须要像那个得克萨斯母亲说的那样，永远活在压力、紧张乃至对金钱的恐惧之中。
sentences.en: No  one should  have  to  live  with  what  a  Texas mother  described  as  constant  stress, tension,  even  fear  about  money
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 我是三个孩子的母亲，也是一名教师以及成长心理学家。
sentences.en: I ’ m a mother of three, a teacher, and a  developmental psychologist .
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 她也是我的母亲。
sentences.en: She was also my mother.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我第一个告诉的人是我母亲。
sentences.en: The first person I told was my mother.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 不管怎样，我母亲和她的红笔都告诉了我，一篇完美的短文可以是多不完美的。
sentences.en: In any event, my mother and her red pen showed me how deeply flawed a flawless essay could be.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 母亲对我的批评告诉我，卡夫卡关于“寒冷的深渊”的说法是正确的，而且当你沉浸在写作过程中必要的内省中时，收获并非总是令人愉悦的。
sentences.en: My mother ’ scriticism had shown me that Kafka is right about the cold abyss,and when you make the  introspective ( 内省的 ) descent that writingrequires you are not always pleased by what you find.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我母亲在这点上是非常符合的。
sentences.en: My mother was well covered on this count.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我母亲说她会教我写作，但我必须先依靠自己的力量。
sentences.en: My mother said she would help me with my writing, but first I had to help myself.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但是，在母亲教授我有关创造力和完美的课程时，我可能也错过了一些重要的启示。
sentences.en: But perhaps I missed something important in my mother ’ s lessons about creativity and perfection.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这是我从母亲身上学到的：如果完美是可以实现的，那么它也不会如此激励人心。
sentences.en: This is the lesson I took from my mother: If perfection were possible, it would not be motivating.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这个女儿担心自己的母亲在那里会被忽视，所以她决定送母亲去一个对待入住者更热情的机构。
sentences.en: The daughter feared her mother would be ignored there, and so she decided to move her into a more welcoming facility.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 该研究调查了挪威近28,000 名母亲，发现那些更为焦虑、抑郁和易怒的母亲更有可能给孩子提供不健康的饮食。
sentences.en: That study looked at nearly 28,000 Norwegian mothers and found that those moms who were more anxious, depressed and angry were more likely to feed their kids unhealthy diets.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 他的母亲确信她不得不采取有力的措施来阻止他走向失败的人生，于是制定了一些规矩。
sentences.en: His mother, convinced that she had to do something dramatic to prevent him from leading a life of failure, lay down some rules.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 女：据目击者称，人们当时都惊恐地看着这个景象， 而孩子的母亲， 据调查名叫Maria Samara 的女士则被吓得呆立在那里。
sentences.en: W: Witnesses said people were ?looking on in horror, as the child’s mother, identified by ?sources as Maria Samara, stood ?frozen in shock.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 两人之间建立了亲密的联系，几周后，这位名叫怀特的陌生人在网站上帮 忙筹集了19万美元，来支持这位孟菲斯少年和他残疾的母亲。
sentences.en: A wonderful bond formed between the two, and within a couple of weeks, the stranger named White helped raise $190,000 on the website to support the Memphis teenager and his disabled mother.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 怀特在众筹网站上解释说，“他想工作，在经济上帮助他的母亲。”。
sentences.en: “He wants to work and help his mother financially.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 一位母亲说，当她的女儿告诉她学区官员对她说“你的账户里没有钱了，所以你不能吃午饭”时，她感到很“意外”。
sentences.en: One mother said she was “blindsided” when her daughter described what a school district official told her, “You don’t have any money in your account, so you can’t get lunch.”
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 然而，很少有人知道她也是一位诺贝尔奖得主的母亲。
sentences.en: However, few people know that she was also the mother of a Nobel Prize winner
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 和她的母亲一样，伊雷娜兼顾了家庭和事业。
sentences.en: Like her mother, Irene combined family with career
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 也如同她的母亲，伊雷娜在1935年同她的丈夫弗雷德里克一起，因研发出新的放射性元素而被授予了诺贝尔奖。
sentences.en: Like her mother, Irene was awarded a Nobel Prize, along with her husband Frederic in 1935, for producing new radioactive elements
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 不幸的是，她也和母亲一样因为暴露于辐射环境而患上了血癌。
sentences.en: Unfortunately, also like her mother, she developed blood cancer because of exposure to radiation
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 我想给爸爸妈妈买件礼物。

sentences.en: a mother of three (= with three children)

sentences.cn: 妈妈们已被警告多年：跟新生儿一起睡是一个坏主意，因为这会增加婴儿在夜间意外死亡的风险。
sentences.en: Mothers have been warned for years that sleeping with their newborn infant is a bad idea, because it increases the risk that the baby might die unexpectedly during the night.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 但现在，以色列的研究人员报告称，甚至睡在同一个房间也会有不良后果：不是对孩子，而是对妈妈。
sentences.en: But now Israeli researchers are reporting that even sleeping in the same room can have negative consequences: not for the child,but for the mother.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 另一方面，婴儿无论是否和妈妈睡在同一个房间，都未出现睡眠质量变差的情况。
sentences.en: Infants, on the other hand, didn’t appear to have worse sleep whether they slept in the same or different room from their mothers.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 如今，为了减少出现婴儿猝死综合征的风险，美国儿科学会建议妈妈不要跟宝宝睡在一张床上，而是睡在同一个房间。
sentences.en: Right now, to reduce the risk of sudden infant death syndrome,  the American Academy of Pediatrics recommends that mothers not sleep in the same bed as their babies, but sleep in the same room.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 最近，一位朋友带着她妈妈去参观了我住的小镇附近一家收费昂贵的辅助生活型住房/ 疗养院。
sentences.en: A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living / nursing home near my town.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.en: Mother has always loved thick porridge.

sentences.en: My mother is spooning sugar from the packet into a bowl.

sentences.en: The mother sat by the sick child all night long.

sentences.cn: 如果我们只吃一块蛋糕, 妈妈是不会知道的.
sentences.en: If we take only one piece of cake, mother will be none the wiser.

sentences.en: Tony and his mother arrived at the farmhouse and walked through the farmyard.

sentences.cn: 扮演舞蹈家的玛丽同时兼演她的妈妈.
sentences.en: Mary , who played the part of the dancer , doubled as her mother.

sentences.cn: 为了减省家里的开支妈妈从不买新衣服.
sentences.en: Mother never buys new clothes, so as to save money for the family.

sentences.cn: 妈妈和姥姥还做了很多美味的食物.
sentences.en: Mother and grandmother also done a lot of delicious food.

sentences.cn: 随着她妈妈,这女孩也取名叫朱莉娅.
sentences.en: The girl was named Julia after her mother.

sentences.cn: 谢谢你做的豆子, 妈妈, 午餐时我对她说, 你真是几百万中才有一个的.
sentences.en: Thanks for the beans, mother, I said to her at lunch, you're one in millions.

sentences.cn: 妈妈发现狗睡在椅子上就用手把狗打跑了.
sentences.en: Mother cuffed the dog when she found it asleep on a chair.

sentences.cn: 我的妈妈总是在周末去逛街.
sentences.en: My mother always goes shopping on Sunday.

sentences.cn: 我妈妈担心我的身体.
sentences.en: My mother was concerned about my health.

sentences.cn: 台阶上站着一个女孩哭着找妈妈.
sentences.en: On the steps a little girl stood crying for her mother.

sentences.cn: 妈妈是由什么成分组成的?
sentences.en: What ingredients are mothers made of?

sentences.cn: 现在杰克和妈妈有东西吃也有钱了, 从此过着幸福快乐的日子.
sentences.en: Jack and his mother now have food and money. They live happily ever after.

sentences.cn: 那个女修道院院长是具有同情心的典范.
sentences.en: The Mother Superior is the soul of compassion.

sentences.cn: 隔壁亚当斯老大娘的猫又不见了.
sentences.en: Old Mother Adams next door has lost her cat again.

sentences.cn: 她作为独自养育孩子们的单身母亲, 得到了大众的支持和鼓励.
sentences.en: Her alone to raise children as single mothers, has been the public's support and encouragement.

sentences.cn: 袋鼠妈妈的这种养育方法也叫做早产儿皮肤接触法.
sentences.en: KangrooKangaroo mother care is also known as the skin skin method for premature babies.

sentences.cn: 成长的过程中母亲又是多么艰难地养育着我!
sentences.en: How hard my mother had a raised and had cultivated me during I was growing up!

sentences.cn: 这位母亲极小心地养育着儿女.
sentences.en: The mother was very careful in rearing her children.

sentences.cn: 她养育着全部生命, 她就是地球母亲!
sentences.en: She fed the whole life, she is earth mother!

sentences.cn: 过去是妈妈养育我, 而现在则是我照顾妈妈.
sentences.en: My mother used to nurse me, now I nurse her.

sentences.cn: 在一块贫瘠的土地上, 大地母亲养育着一颗被风儿吹来的树种.
sentences.en: In a barren land, the earth mother and rearing a species has been Feng ER blowing.

sentences.cn: 养育孩子的现实经常与浪漫的理想大相径庭。
sentences.en: The reality of mothering is frequently very different from the romantic ideal.

sentences.cn: Parents爱天生他们的孩子, 其中中国母亲和父亲是没关于溺爱有例外.
sentences.en: Parents love their children by nature, where Chinese mothers and fathers are no exceptions.

sentences.cn: 一个溺爱孩子的母亲会把孩子宠坏.
sentences.en: A fond mother may spoil her child.

sentences.cn: 他的妈妈溺爱他,总是满足他的各种要求.
sentences.en: His mother spoiled him indulging his every whim.

sentences.cn: 母亲溺爱最小的女儿.
sentences.en: The mother made too much of her youngest daughter.

sentences.cn: 我被溺爱我的妈妈宠坏了.
sentences.en: I am the product of a fond mother.

sentences.cn: 这个溺爱的母亲给她儿子买他要的任何东西.
sentences.en: The indulgent mother bought her boy everything he wanted.

sentences.cn: 她是个溺爱的母亲, 随时准备为子女添置新衣服.
sentences.en: She is an indulgent mother, ever ready to provide new clothes.

sentences.cn: 溺爱孩子的母亲给孩子们太多的爱,以至于和丈夫疏远了.
sentences.en: TYPICAL USE : A doting mother alienates her husband by lavishing too much love on their child.

sentences.cn: 溺爱孩子的母亲给孩子太多的爱,以至于和丈夫疏远了.
sentences.en: A doting mother alienates her husband lavishing too much love on their child.

sentences.cn: 他母亲对他过于溺爱。
sentences.en: His mother overindulged him.

Sentence.sentence: My mother was well covered on this count.

Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In any event, my mother and  her red pen showed me how deeply flawed a flawless essay could be.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I'm a mother of three, a teacher, and a developmental psychologist.

Sentence.sentence: But perhaps I missed something  important in my mother's lessons about creativity and perfection.

Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文
